millsfield:images_texts:
Pan Am's New Clipper Class.
The Business Class to Beat.
Clipper Class has always been in a class by itself.
And New Clipper Class is even better.
It's expanded, freshly redecorated and upgraded.
We call it New Clipper Class and it will be available on
Pan Am's all 747 international fleet and on most 747's flying
across the USA. There will be 52 Clipper Class seats on all
747's in three private cabins,
two of them just behind
First Class and one just above. The upper deck on our 747's
will now become Clipper Class seating. Designated as an
exclusive non-smoking quiet zone, the New Clipper Class
upper deck will have its own flight attendant for a very special
brand of service.
Each new cabin on our 747's features six-across seating
in a 2-2-2 layout for stretch-out comfort in seats larger in every
dimension and more comfortable in every way.
Pan Am's Clipper Class on our popular 747S's is also
expanded to 100 seats. The upper deck of 747SPs will continue
to serve our First Class passengers. The popular 9-a-week
Tokyo-New York nonstop are operated by 747SP's.
Another exclusive from Pan Am.
Our New Clipper Class will also include overhead bins
three times larger than before, with room for several garment
bags laid out flat, plus freshly redecorated cabins, new electron-
ic headsets, and your choice of international entrees served
to you course-by-course during our new meal service.
You Can Fly Pan Am's New Clipper Class For
Ordinary Economy Class Prices.
Pan Am's New Clipper Class is a private cabin designed
especially for business travelers. And you can experience all of
its new benefits for the price of ordinary economy class.
Only Pan Am offers New Clipper Class •• already avail-
able on many aircraft, and soon to be completed on the world's
largest fleet of 747's.
Pan Am. You Can't Beat The Experience:
For reservations and intormation call vour ravel Agent or Pan Am.
Tokyo:03(240)8888. Keio Plaza Hotel:03(344)0329. Hotel Okura: 03(582)0111 ext. 4800. Imperial Hotel: 03(501)6057. Yokohama: 045(681)3321. Osaka: 06(271)5951.
Kobe: 078(321)2675. Nagoya:052(571)5488. *Fukuoka:092(411)2411. *Kagoshima: 0992(24)0461. *Okinawa:0988(66)5111.
*All Nippon Airways:Pan Am General Sales Agent.
